text: Wow, this is like a physical manifestation of my hard drive. I can't even count how many unfinished projects I have. 😅
Same here! It's comforting to know there's a whole planet for our abandoned ideas.
Can you imagine the chaos if they all suddenly became sentient and started demanding our attention? That would be an interstellar nightmare!
Maybe we should start a crowdfunding campaign to launch a mission to this planet. We could finally find all those missing semicolons and unfinished README files.
And all those "temporary" solutions that ended up being permanent. I bet this planet's core is made of spaghetti code.
I guess this is where all those "I'll finish it later" promises go to die. RIP countless weekend projects.
I have a feeling that if we somehow manage to finish even one project on that planet, we'd unlock the secret to the universe.
Or, you know, just end up with another unfinished project.
I wonder if this planet has a dark side made up of deprecated libraries and outdated frameworks.
Don't forget the graveyard of abandoned programming languages. May they rest in peace.
There's probably a whole continent dedicated to Flash.
